#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <cctype>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

string s;
int t;

bool isprime(ll n)
{
    if (n == 1) return false;
    if (n == 2) return true;
    for (ll i = 2; i * i <= n; i++) if (n % i == 0) return false;
    return true;
}

bool found = false;
ll sol = 0;

void dfs(ll n, int depth)
{
    if (depth == s.size())
    {
        if (isprime(n)) {found = true; sol = n;}
        return;
    }

    if (isdigit(s[depth]) && !found) dfs(n * 10 + s[depth] - '0', depth + 1);
    else if (!found)
    {
        int i = 0;
        if (depth == 0) i = 1;

        for (; i < 10; i++) if (!found) dfs(n * 10 + i, depth + 1);
    }
}

int main()
{
    cin.sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin >> t;

    while (t--)
    {
        cin >> s;

        found = false;
        sol = 0;
        dfs(0, 0);

        cout << sol << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
